tutorial.s0:
Welcome to the tutorial of
Myomyw, The two sides
should push balls in turns.
Now the black balls on
the chessboard are
'common balls'.
On the upper
left and
upper
right of
the
chessboard,
there are ejectors.
Touch to continue...
